        public XInputStream​(List<Integer> output)

      • XInputStream

        public XInputStream​(String hex)

        From HEX string.

        Each byte needs to be encoded with 2 symbols (padded with 0) and separated with comma.

        Example:

        
 new XInputStream("68, 65, 6c, 6c, 6f")
